meta.name: title
meta.content: Truman Public School District #0458 Home of the Jaguars/Jayhawks
Truman Public School District #0458 Home of the Jaguars/Jayhawks
Truman Public School District #0458 Home of the Jaguars/Jayhawks

link.title: Truman Public School District #0458 Home of the Jaguars/Jayhawks

img.alt: Truman Public School District #0458 Home of the Jaguars/Jayhawks

a.font: JMC Access for Parents, Students & Staff

b.u: PLEASE STAY HOME and SOCIAL DISTANCE for our Community

font.font: Lisa Noren Shellum - Superintendent/Principal/Sped. Director - shelluml@truman.k12.mn.us Ext. 3917

b.font: Deb Sherman - School Social Worker - shermand@truman.k12.mn.us Ext. 3980
Kayla Anderson - Dean of Students/Activities Director: andersonk@truman.k12.mn.us
Send your pictures to Mr. Meyer

font.font: The Truman Public School would like to thank those that are working for all of us each day to help get through the Covid-19 Virus pandemic. We know you are all risking your health, safety and own well being each day and no words can thank you enough.

div.span: We appreciate everything you are doing for all of us and our safety.

div.font: Please send photo's along with names of those in the picture at your jobs, your jobs at home, teaching
your children or other pics to; shelluml@truman.k12.mn.us
We want to honor and thank everyone as we are all doing our part.

b.font: This weeks Hero is ABBY STITH - Mayo Health System

font.font: Thank you to parents, teachers, students and community for the great support during Distance Learning. Everyone was amazing - You all ROCK!

u.font: Please use alternate phone number below - if needed. Please call the school first and the message will alert you to whether you need to contact the alternative number. We are trying to be in the building on a rotating schedule.

i.font: The building is closed through May 4th, 2020 per Gov. Waltz Shelter in Place order.
Please call 507-436-5461 during the school hours of 8:00 a.m. to 4:00 p.m.
If you call after 4:00 p.m., please leave message for a return call the next day.

div.font: This week we are introducing our Virtual Principal's office. If you need support for any issue that you would have normally needed us for during the school day, we are here. Parents, if you need assistance with any issue while you are navigating distance learning including behaviors, reluctance, difficulty understanding concepts or
how to teach a lesson, attendance and also positive things, we can help.
We will use virtual meetings, e-mails and phone communications to assist you.

font.font: shelluml@truman.k12.mn.us Mrs. Anderson - andersonk@truman.k12.mn.us Ms. Sherman - shermand@bruman.k12.mn.us

i.font: Attendance is mandatory during Distance Learning. Parents please call the school at
507-436-5461 if your child is sick for the day so that teachers do not count them absent. Please call with any extenuating circumstances as they may happen in this situation.

span.font: Lunches are still available for delivery. School Work when needed will be delivered weekly with a more permanent schedule to follow.Please call the number above or e-mail office@truman.k12.mn.us for a lunch.

font.b: Registration for Truman Preschool next Fall is happening right now. Please register by filling out this

span.font: If you have a sheet to return for the Cookie Dough Fundraiser, you may put in a plastic bin that the para's are carrying when lunch is delivered or contact the office at office@truman.k12.mn.us to let us know that it needs to be picked up. Please get all order in by Wednesday, April 1, 2020. The district will contact families to talk about how this will be dispersed.

div.span: I Pledge Allegiance to the flag of the United States of America and to the Republic for which is stands, one nation, under God, indivisible with liberty and justice for all.

b.font: All Distance Learning Information is located on the top left hand side button entitled: DISTANCE LEARNING. Please go there to get all required information and teacher webpages/emails.

i.span: The Regular Truman Public School Board Meeting will be held virtually beginning on March 30, 2020. For any questions regarding the meeting structure please e-mail Supt. Lisa Shellum at shelluml@truman.k12.mn.us

div.span: This is based on Mn. Statute 13D.021 and the state of Federal and State Emergency Declaration regarding limiting person-to-person contact during this emergency. This is indefinite and will change according to state mandates from Gov. Waltz and guidance from the Minnesota School Board Association.

font.b: Please stay home and stay safe for our kids so we can see each other again soon
Lunch Menu, Sports information and additional announcements:

b.font: at the top left hand of this website.

font.span: 019-20 Truman Public School Student Handbook K-12

b.font: 2018-19 Yearbooks will be available this fall! There will be extra. Contact the office if you want to order one.

font.b: There may be other years available for sale. Please check with the office. If they are available, the price is $30.00.
